title: Possible to refund all the Chromas I purchased with IP?
body:
With the new shop coming out during the pre-season, and IP converting to blue essence, by now many of you know the the exclusive URF-Warwick skin coming out, but playing this game so long I had so much IP and in the last year or so, Riot gave sales for Chroma skins for IP, so naturally I just had a lot of useless IP laying around and just dumped it all in that since I had nothing else to buy with it, but in the end now an exclusive rare skin comes out and I get screwed in the end.  Is it possible that I can get those refunded lol?  Or am I just screwed cause i don't even think i'll be able to get even some of the medium tier items in the essence shop.  Just feeling a little screwed over. 
{{champion:32}}

replies.body: You're welcome to reach out to our billing team in a ticket to see about that, but I'm not so sure we'll be able to provide refunds simply because new content is being made available.
Refund Credits are used to refund items bought from the Shop. If you used up all your credits, you will not be able to refund anything bought from the Shop.
